name: Prototype: Have Fun!
description:
Instructions to run the game:

  • You need two screens to play this game.
  • Press the "WIN key" + "P" and select extend.
  • Start the game.
  • Player One needs Keyboard, and Player Two needs Xbox One Controller.

How to play!

  • This is a competitive game, and you need two screens and an extended display to run this game. Player one can play with the Keyboard, and player two can play with a joystick.
  • There are two types of serves. Flat Serve and Kick Serve
  • To throw the ball faster to the other side, you need to touch the ball using a dash.
  • There is dynamite in your or the opponent's area at some point in the game. The ball will turn into dynamite with a timer if you collect it. If the timer finishes and explodes on you, you are dead. If you miss the bomb and hit the wall, it will also explode. If you are in the range, you are also dead. 

Have Fun!
